question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-vm/types/src/code/cache/module_cache.rs] [Function: insert_deserialized_module(), lines 255-286] [Version downgrade attack] In UnsyncModuleCache::insert_deserialized_module(), can an attacker exploit race conditions between version comparison (line 265) and entry insertion (line 274) to insert older deserialized code over newer verified code, potentially bypassing verification and executing malicious bytecode? (Critical)
